0. Default template.description: This permission template will be used as default when no other permission configuration is available

groups.sonar-administrators: admin, codeviewer, issueadmin, scan, securityhotspotadmin, user
admin, applicationcreator, gateadmin, portfoliocreator, profileadmin, provisioning, scan

groups.Z. Bad group - No members: A group with no members. This makes no sense
groups.language-experts: Language experts in charge of defining the company governance in terms of Quality Profiles (rulesets enforced in the company)
groups.project-admins: Project administrators in charge of project configuration
groups.quality-managers: Quality Managers in charge of defining company governance in terms of quality gates
groups.security-auditors: Security Auditors in charge of reviewing security issues
groups.tech-leads: Senior developers in charge of reviewing issues

bad:portfolio-singleton.description: A portfolio that contains a single project - This makes little sense, it merely reports the same as the project itself
bad:portfolio-singleton.name: Portfolio with a single project - BAD

bad:portfolio-with-no-perms.description: A portfolio that has no permissions - Noone can see it, it makes little sense
bad:portfolio-with-no-perms.name: Portfolio with no perms - BAD

bad:public-portfolio.description: A portfolio that's public. Not recommended. Better grant permission to the sonar-users group
bad:public-portfolio.name: Public portfolio - BAD

  pattern: "\\bCORP_SECRET_\\d{10}\\b"

     patternAround:
         pattern: "<CorpConnectionSpec>"
         maxLineDistance: 10
         maxCharDistance: 500
